meanings: (어떤 장소에) be, (건물 등이) stand, be located (in/at), be situated, (도시 등이) lie
(시설·장치 등이) have, (시설이) be equipped with, be provided with

vlive.korean: 거치대 하나만 있었어도 좋겠다... I wish I had a camera mount... 듣기 View video RAINBOW : [RAINBOW] 승아와 함께하는 두 번째 데이트!
vlive.english: I wish I had a camera mount...

vlive.korean: 만약에 제가 이 자리에 서 있었어도... If I were there standing by him... 듣기 View video DSPmedia : [디.훈.소] DSP의 훈남들을 소개합니다~♥
vlive.english: If I were there standing by him...

vlive.korean: 여기에 담겨 있었어도 될 것 같아. -응. I think you could put it in here. - Yes. 듣기 View video V Special : [Replay] Christmas Week EP.1 GFRIEND (여자친구)
vlive.english: I think you could put it in here. - Yes.

vlive.korean: 괜찮아. 안 보고 있었어도 괜찮아. - 왜요? 뭐 했어요? It's OK. - Why? What did you do? 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 여친과 함께 고고싱 가포르
vlive.english: It's OK. - Why? What did you do?

vlive.korean: 햇빛만 있었어도 더 예뻤을 텐데, 햇빛. It would've been prettier with some sunlight. 듣기 View video ASTRO : <아스트로 프로젝트 아시아> 5화 (ASTRO PROJECT ep.5)
vlive.english: It would've been prettier with some sunlight.

examples.korean: The weather was so bad we might just as well have stayed at home. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 날씨가 너무 안 좋아서 우리가 그냥 집에 있었어도 괜찮을 걸 그랬다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
